Disable STAMINA mode for this app.
Depending on your phone model you should:

Go to Phone settings > Power Management > Stamina mode > Apps active in standby and enable this app

or


Go to Phone settings > Battery > Three dots top right corner > Battery optimisation > Apps and disable optimisation for this app
